flawed_nl_solution:
Oscar needs to increase his maximum running time from 20 - 2 = <<20-2=18>>18 miles.
Oscar will need a total of 18 / ( 2/3 ) = <<18/(2/3)=72>>72 weeks to prepare.

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 27, not 72. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
